meta.title: Join the Waitlist - KeepsVault
meta.description: Be the first to know when KeepsVault launches. Join our waitlist for early access.

waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist
waitlist.subtitle: Be the first to experience KeepsVault
waitlist.description: Get early access to KeepsVault and help shape the future of secure document management.

form.title: Get Early Access
form.usageLabel: How do you plan to use KeepsVault?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We're targeting a Q2 2024 launch. Waitlist members will get access first.
faq.q2: Is there a cost to join the waitlist?
faq.a2: No, joining the waitlist is completely free. You'll only pay when you start using the service.
